more_content:
New York Fashion Week will take place from September 6–14, 2019. While most shows are industry-only, it’s possible to attend events open to the public. Get the full scoop here at The New Yorker Hotel blog. 

Fashion Week 

The major fashion event of the year actually takes place biannually, in February and September. As we said earlier, most grand runway shows and parties are open only to the industry and press, however, each year more events are open to the public. Have you always wanted to dress to the nines or parade in your most unique outfit? This is your chance!

Where to Buy Tickets

One way to snag sought-after tickets is by purchasing a one-year membership to Fashion Week Online, which costs only $10! If you aren’t interested in a membership, then check out Eventbrite for a full lineup of public ticketed events. Prices start for as little as $15. 

Public Events

New York Fashion Week events are becoming more varied each year. They also take place throughout the city and cater to different tastes. Keep in mind that events will continue to be added to the FWO and Eventbrite listings until September, so bookmark the websites. Some anticipated events include: Playboy Club x Fashion Week Online NYFW Wrap Party, Ontavia Roulette Fashion Show, New York Fashion Week powered by Fashion Nation and FIFI Fashion Show. 

Look for NYC Fashion Inspiration

Social media is the perfect place to find fashion inspiration, especially Instagram. In fact, it’s now more common to see influencers and Instagram-born celebrities making fashion statements in these events. If you want to follow the latest trends or get ideas for your own wardrobe, check out these accounts:

The New York Times Fashion & Style: @nytimesfashion
Olivia Palermo: @oliviapalermo
Leandra Medine: @manrepeller
Erica Choi: @eggcanvas
Mustafa Kacar: @mustafakacar
Brian Sacawa: @hespokestyle
Lauren Mazzei: @laurenmazzei
Andrea Pion: @asliceopi

Shop 'Til You Drop!

Now that you’ve found inspiration for the perfect outfit, it’s time to make sure you look the part. The New Yorker Hotel is located in the heart of Midtown, close to major stores and designer stores. With Macy’s flagship store and Fifth Avenue just a short walk away, we’re near the very best of New York’s stylish shopping. 

Don’t miss out on the last grand fashion event of the year. Take a look at our New York hotel deals and book your room at our historic hotel, where New York’s elite have been gathering for years.
title: Your Guide to New York Fashion Week
